description:
Portrait Jar with Stirrup Spout representing Jaguar God, silver, Peruvian, V-VIc cat. card dims H 9-5/8 inches.
Curving eyebrows flare at the ends into cat's ears; bared teeth with four huge tusks protruding. Hammered and soldered, with a horizontal solder line visible around back of head and along upper part of eyebrow groove.
title: Portrait Jar representing the anthropomorphic Jaguar God
